name: Reflection (itch) (SaiCHIzo)
description:
Reflection was a project done for one of my college classes. This version is a Prototype/early version and I would like to flesh it out more. It's a story of surviving suicide, with horror elements.

TW/Content Warning: Suicide, Language

Uhm, I guess this is a placeholder since you can't play Flash games anymore in browser. Hopefully I can convert this to HTML or something in the future but my coding knowledge is pretty limited...
